column4: youtube videos lag... anything i can do to fix this??? i am using dell mini 9 with ubuntu netbook remix, 64gb runcore ssd and 2gb ram
youtube videos lag... is there anything i can do to fix this??? i am using dell mini 9 with ubuntu netbook remix, 64gb runcore ssd and 2gb ram
: You get an good conexion an the correct flash plugin.
how do i update the flash plugin? my internet connexion is already great
: Look in the Firefox (if you use it!) at Tools>Add-Ons>Plugins
: See if you get some description about the Flash 10.0 (Usually you will find "Shockwave Flash 10.0 r22)
i have shockwave flash 9... how doi get 10... or do i need it
: You don't need it. But you must see if the flash plugin that you have is working properly. By you descriptio it don't seems to work very well.
the sound is fine... just the video is choppy
: I once installed one plugin that I could only listen the sound but not see anyhing.
: The usual plugin (That use to work properly at almost all cases) is the flashplugin-nonfree
